bio: Founder of 3mdeb, where he champions open-source firmware solutions, emphasizing transparency, collaboration, and user freedom. Through initiatives like the Dasharo Users Group and contributions to platforms such as OpenSecurityTraining2, he nurtures a community centered on shared growth and learning. Piotr embodies 3mdeb's mission not just as a leader but as a daily practitioner, steering the company with a strategic and hands-on approach. Beyond his professional role, he is a chess enthusiast, a keen reader, and a nature lover, driven by a ceaseless curiosity to explore and understand the world.
